results.title: The Hollywood Palace
results.creator_credit: Grey Lockwood, William Harbach and Zodiac Enterprises
results.brief_description: The Hollywood Palace was a very popular long-running American variety show televised on Saturday nights from 1964-1970. Its success was mainly due to its high profile guests and variety of entertainment offered to its viewers along with the revolving core group of hosts including Sammy Davis Jr, Jimmy Durante, Don Adams, Fred Astaire, Judy Garland and the ever popular Bing Crosby. This video is a special edition of the final show hosted by Crosby which takes a look back at some of the most memorable moments with performances by Nat King Cole (“Unforgettable”), Fred Astaire and Ethel Merman (“Anything goes”), Judy Garland (“Be a clown”), Dean Martin (“Volare”), and many more. It also includes some great comedy sketches by such comedians as Jerry Lewis, Groucho Marx, Don Knots, Jack Benny, Debbie Reynolds, Phyllis Diller and Burns and Allen with some “behind-the-scenes” footage of rehearsals and bloopers by the stars. This is a travel down memory lane. An interesting footnote: the Rolling Stones made their first US TV appearance on the show in 1964. Due to the unique material contained in this program, variations may occur in picture and sound quality.

results.title: The Hometown
results.creator_credit: Bettina Matzkuhn, Jack Long and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: A collection of tapestries designed and sewn by the filmmaker, Bettina Matzkuhn, illustrate the lyrics of a song about a young girl’s hometown. Animation is created through a combination of sewing and cinematic techniques. The needlework, done in a naive style, is well suited to the bright colours and varied textures of the work. A lively film designed to promote interest in the art of tapestry

results.title: The Hole = Onibaba [Widescreen]
results.creator_credit: Kaneto Shindo, Hisao Itoya, Kazuo Kuwahara, Setsuo Noto, Tamotsu Minato, Kindai Eiga Kyokai, Toho Kabushiki Kaisha and Tokyo Eiga Company
results.brief_description: Set in the 16th century at a time of brutal clan warfare, peasants are driven to desperate remedies just to stay alive. If that means killing samurai and flogging their amour, then so be it. The two leading characters - a widow (Nobuko Otowa) and her daughter-in-law (Yitsuko Yoshimura) are engaged in just such a racket. Shindo spares us none of the details: victims are speared, stripped and unceremoniously dumped in the concealed pit that hides the evidence of their crime. A samurai, separated from his troops, stumbles into the lakeside village bizarrely clad in the mask of a demon. He wears it, he says, to protect his handsome features from the ravages of war. Like many before him, he is slain and his mask is purloined and used by the widow to terrify her daughter-in-law, of whose unabashed sexuality she is jealous. But the plan misfires, the mask shrinks and clings to her face and when it has to be forcibly released, it discloses the worst horror of all. Music by Mitsu Hayashi. In Japanese with English Subtitles.

results.title: The Hitman
results.creator_credit: Tung Wai, Gordon Chan and China Star HK Distribution Ltd
results.brief_description: Following the assassination of a top Japanese Yakuza boss in Hong Kong, the most skilled hitmen assemble at a meeting held by the administrators of the dead man’s Revenge Fund, which promises $100 million for the head of the killer. One hopeful yet good-hearted hitman is Fu, a pennyless mainlander who accidentally walks into the meeting and is adopted by Ngok Lo, a con man agent for professional hitmen. Ngok Lo buys Fu new clothes and coaches him in the Hong Kong ways, proposing that Fu help him track down the killer so they can claim the bounty. In Cantonese with English subtitles. Cast includes: Jet Li, Eric Tsang, Simon Yam, Gigi Leung and Keiji Sato.

results.title: The Home buyers' bible
results.brief_description: Don’t be trapped when buying a home. Designed to prepare you for what will quite possibly be the most important purchase of your life. It prepares you with the information needed to protect yourself from problems whan buying a home, whilst also supplying information about what to do and where to go should you encounter difficulties after purchasing a home.

results.title: The History of the Luftwaffe
results.brief_description: After the skirmishes of WW1 armed forces fought each other in the skies for the first time, and soon planes would presage every role of future armies and navies. Upon losing the war, the size of the German armed forces was restricted, to ensure that Germany did not become a military threat in Europe. In the 1920s the desire for new technology and military designs was urgent, and following Hitler’s rise to power in the 1930s, much of the research and development was conducted clandestinely. Despite restrictions, a massive and formidable air force - The Luftwaffe - was born, and Germany’s armed forces burgeoned. This documentary uses extensive archival footage, much of it recently recovered from the East and viewed for the first time, to display these weapons of war. The role of Hitler and Hermann Goering is discussed at length, as these two warmongers contributed to the fortunes of the Luftawaffe throughout WW2. Features extensive and fascinating black and white footage of Europe from the 1910s, 20s, 30s and 40s, showing the incredible devastation of war on the land and people. Aeroplane enthusiasts, and particularly those interested in war planes, should enjoy the historical visuals and informative narrative of the various planes of the Luftwaffe.

results.title: The History of soccer
results.creator_credit: Jamie Baker, Stewart Binns and WPE
results.brief_description: The definitive, all-encompassing documentary on the international history of the most popular sport in the world. This film goes back to the roots of football and traces its remarkable growth across the world. The story of the people’s game begins 2,000 years ago. All the major civilisations around the world have a record of soccer as part of their culture, with the oldest and most complete records found in China. This video features 3 hours of history and fantastic World Cup action.

results.title: The Holy Innocents = Los Santos Inocentes
results.creator_credit: Mario Camus, Julian Mateoas and Ganesh
results.brief_description: The Holy innocents is a poignant rural drama zeroing in on the abysmal class differences still existing in some sections of modern Spain, especially in the holdings of the rural aristocracy. The story concerns an impoverished family working on the estate of an aristocratic family in the province of Extramaduna in the 1960s. Each of the members of the poor family is spotlighted for a part of the film.
